attributes.action: Stop Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister unless the public decide in a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Tony Blair steps down from office it should not be up to the labour party to decide who is then going to be prime minister. They should choose there next leader and call a general election. Let the people decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
